newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Eleven die in Indonesian airplane crash.
newsitem.headline: Eleven die in Indonesian airplane crash.

text.p: Eleven people were killed and 28 injured in a plane crash on Saturday on the Indonesian island of Belitung, the official Antara news agency said.

Antara said a Merpati Nusantara Airlines twin turbo-prop aircraft with 57 passengers on board crashed short of the Buluh Tumbang airport on Belitung, 400 km (248 miles) north of Jakarta at about 7:53 a.m. (0035 GMT).
The report said that about four hours after the crash 11 bodies had been brought to the Belitung general hospital, including the pilot and a stewardess.

Search and rescue officials in Jakarta said the cause of the crash was not yet known. But they said the plane, which was on a flight to Belitung from Jakarta, had broken into three sections upon impact.
